sections.general:
CONSUMER SERVICES ADVOCATE
Career Overview
Dedicated Customer Service Representative motivated to maintain customer satisfaction and contribute to company success.
Core Strengths
Strong organizational skills Adaptive team player
Seasoned in conflict resolution Visual merchandising proficiency
Active listening skills Fashion knowledge
Energetic work attitude Opening/closing procedures
Telephone inquiries specialist Telecommunication skills
Customer service expert Invoice processing
Accomplishments
Customer Service Â
Researched, calmed and rapidly resolved client conflicts to prevent loss of key accounts.
Customer Interface Â
Greeted customers upon entrance and handled all cash and credit transactions.
Assisted customers over the phone regarding store operations, product, promotions and orders.
Database Maintenance Â
Assisted in the managing of the company database and verified, edited and modified members' information.
Product Sales Â
Cross-sold services at a rate of 30%, upgrading customers to different plans and product packages.
Computed Data Reports Â
Provided required weekly, monthly and quarterly reports listing sales figures and client track records.
